{Barret}
“Hey {Cloud}!”{PAUSE}“We come this far, and you're thinkin'
of goin' back down to the 1st floor?”
{CHOICE}Yeah
{CHOICE}No…

{Barret}
“No time for that now!
Stop messin' around, boy!”
